name: Banana Pancakes Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: large ripe banana, egg, vanilla extract, cinnamon
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix in the egg, then vanilla and cinnamon.
Pour pancake batter in ¼ cup (60 ml) amounts on a griddle or skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until bubbles pop on the surface of the pancake, then flip and cook the other side.
